data.title: Ionia County Letts Cemetery
data.text:
LETTS CEMETERY Peck Lake Road, Ionia County, Michigan

Association Owned Original records at the Ionia Community Library in Ionia Copied with their permission

Compiled by Margaret Coppes June 1965-67.

Potter, Sally - A researcher wrote: "I was doing some research and came across the correct burial location for Sally Potter, wife of Zaphna Potter. Zaphna is indeed buried in Letts Cemetery with a stone marker, but Sally is not buried there. After Zaphna's death, she moved to Ohio and lived with her son, she is buried in the old Rockport Cemetery on the west side of the present day Cleveland, Ohio. She died November 26, 1874 in Rockport, Cuyahoga County, Ohio."

This copy contributed for use in the USGenWeb Archives.
